name: SomewhereOuthere
description:
It's my very first attemp to make game, so it was hard but a lot of fun! Game was made with my friend Naotami, who made all artwork and sounds.

Goal is to create as much satellites as required to build signal power. Each satellite adds a bit of signal power to the signal bar level at the top left corner. When signal power is high enough you recieving message from outter space and win the game.

Controls:

To prevent problems with resolution and scale, please use fullscreen mode at the bottom.

Before start you need to clear orbit from spacejunk, to perform this task, just click on each piece of spacejunk three times.

To build satellite, you need to click spaceport button at the centre and drag your mous e in a direction, in which you want your satellite to fly. Each satellite cost 5M, which you gain by time and destroying spacejunk.

Enjoy the game, thanks to all who would play! Would love to see feedback and constructive criticism. 

GL HF, stay safe, ADC_heh.
